amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $105 million from the Truth in Sentencing Incentives Grant program to crime prevention, drug treatment and family resource programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to transfer $105 million from Truth in Sentencing Incentive Grants to other programs including Boys and Girls Clubs, Court Appointed Special Advocates, Substance Abuse Treatment for State Prisoners, and Drug Courts.

action.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 271 (Roll No. 385).
